otherNames: Pampered Mr. Lu’s wife and fateful meeting
synopsis: The vicious stepmother and the green tea sister committed evil one after another, but they were rescued by him unexpectedly, and strongly asked for marriage. From then on, she became the wife of the living king of Kyoto, Lu Zeyuan, which made her parents and the scum-man's ex anxious. A sweet love affair also unfolded from this...
